content: शिथिल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [श्लथ्-किलच् पृषो° <ls>Uṇ. 1. 53</ls>] {@--1@} Loose, loosened, slackened, relaxed. {@--2@} Untied, unfastened; <ls>Ś. 2. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Severed, fallen from the stalk; अर्कस्योपरि शिथिलं च्युतमिव नवमल्लिकाकुसुमं <ls>Ś. 2. 8.</ls> {@--4@} Languid, enfeebled, unnerved. {@--5@} Weak, feeble; अशिथिलपरिरंभ <ls>U. 1. 24</ls>, <ls n="U. 1.">27</ls> 'fast or close embrace'. {@--6@} Flaccid, flabby. {@--7@} Dissolved. {@--8@} Decayed. {@--9@} Ineffective, futile, vain. {@--10@} Inattentive, careless; <ls>Pt. 4. 116.</ls> {@--11@} Loosely done, not strictly or rigidly performed. {@--12@} Cast off, abandoned. --लं {@--1@} Laxity, looseness. {@--2@} Slowness. (शिथिलीकृ means {1} to loosen, unfasten, untie. {2} to relax, slacken. {3} to weaken, impair, enfeeble. {@--4@} to give up, abandon; <ls>R. 2. 41.</ls> शिथिलीभू {1} to be slackened or relaxed. {2} to fall off from; <ls>Mk. 1. 13</ls>).
